meanings.definition: A type of seabird found in the northern hemisphere.
meanings.sent1: Murres are skilled divers, catching fish underwater.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of murres flying over the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The murres had a meeting to discuss their next fishing trip.
meanings.sent4: The murres in the sky resembled black arrows darting towards the water.
meanings.sent5: The sound of murres calling to each other filled the coastal air.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'murre', referring to multiple seabirds of this type.
meanings.sent1: We observed a colony of murres nesting on the cliffs.
meanings.sent2: The murres' eggs are speckled and blend in with the rocks.
meanings.sent3: During migration, the murres formed a long line in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The murres' synchronized diving was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The murres' population has been steadily increasing over the years.
